display_long_description:
🎄 A Fun & Festive VR Reflex Game for Meta Quest

Step into a joyful holiday-themed VR experience where your reflexes and hand-eye coordination are put to the ultimate test! In this fast-paced VR arcade game, your goal is simple—but addictive: catch the falling sticks from the machine before they hit the ground.

Sounds easy? Think again 😉

🎅 Catch Sticks & Unlock Santa’s Surprise

Standing beside you is a cheerful Santa Claus, holding a playful sign that says:

“Collect more than 5 sticks and I will dance for you.”

Accept the challenge, sharpen your reflexes, and catch more than 5 sticks to unlock a special festive celebration that fills the entire scene with holiday cheer. The reward is worth it—and it’s guaranteed to make you smile.

🕹️ Simple Controls, Addictive Gameplay

This VR game is designed to be easy to pick up and play, making it perfect for:

Quick VR sessions
Casual players
Reflex and reaction-time training
Fun holiday-themed experiences
Just jump in, use your hands, and start catching. The more accurate and faster you are, the quicker you unlock the surprise.

Note: This app is not suitable for children under 10 years old.
